content:
They haven't got attention of reviewers chosen by bors for a month and I don't know who else I can ping.
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/92138
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/92124
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/92104

FWIW, I think reviews slowed down over the last month due to holidays, you could probably ping the relevant reviewers to see if they're back or can hand-off to someone else (edit: i see you've done that)
I've self assigned them, should be able to get to them in the next week or less.
